name: part_007
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: The ReGLOSS members discuss who will sing the next song in their karaoke session.
Todoroki Kanade and Ichijou Ririka perform 'Ikenai Taiyou' by ORANGE RANGE.
The members discuss the high energy of the performance and the nostalgic 'Heisei' era vibes.

subtitles.original: さあ、次は誰歌う？
subtitles.english: Alright, who's singing next?

subtitles.original: 次奏ちゃん歌うか。
subtitles.english: How about Kanade goes next?

subtitles.original: ええ？！ええ？！
subtitles.english: What?! What?!

subtitles.original: 歌っちゃう？
subtitles.english: I'm really doing it?

subtitles.original: 歌っちゃう！
subtitles.english: You're doing it!

subtitles.original: なんだろう、いいよ、じゃあ番長のセンスに任せるわ。
subtitles.english: Well, okay then. I'll leave the choice to Bancho's taste.

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ私のセンスで。オッケーオッケー。
subtitles.english: Oh, sure, leave it to me. Okay, okay.

subtitles.original: オッケー、じゃあ奏準備オッケー？
subtitles.english: Okay. Kanade, you ready?

subtitles.original: うん。はい。お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Yep. Okay. Here I go!

subtitles.original: お願いしまーす。
subtitles.english: Take it away!

subtitles.original: おおー！
subtitles.english: Whooa!

subtitles.original: いい曲きた！
subtitles.english: A classic!

subtitles.original: テンション上げ上げ！
subtitles.english: Let's pump it up!

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: チョットでいいから　見せてくれないか
subtitles.english: Just a little, won't you show me?

subtitles.original: お前のセクシー・フェロモンで　オレ　メロメロ
subtitles.english: Your sexy pheromones leave me head over heels.

subtitles.original: Ah ふれちゃいそう　でもイケナイの！
subtitles.english: Ah, it feels like we're touching, but it's forbidden!

subtitles.original: 徐々に高なる鼓動　止められないわ
subtitles.english: My heart's beating faster and faster, I can't stop it.

subtitles.original: 交わす言葉の記憶遠く　口元の動きに揺れ動く
subtitles.english:
The memory of the words we exchanged is far away,
I'm swayed by the movement of your lips.

subtitles.original: 濡れた髪を撫でた　そして Ah
subtitles.english: I stroked your wet hair, and then... Ah.

subtitles.original: ABC 続かない　そんなんじゃダメじゃない
subtitles.english: ABC won't follow, that's just not good enough, is it?

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は　違うんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Because deep down in your heart, it's different, isn't it?

subtitles.original: オレの青春　そんなもんじゃない
subtitles.english: My youth isn't just about that.

subtitles.original: 熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to go all the way in a burning heat.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃやだよ　オレはイケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: It has to be you, I'm the forbidden sun.

subtitles.original: 「赤い糸」なんて絵空事　でも下心でさえ信じたいの
subtitles.english:
A 'red thread of fate' is just a dream,
but I want to believe even in base desires.

subtitles.original: 俺は正しい　キミも正しい　とにかくもう左右されないぜ
subtitles.english: I'm right, and you're right, anyway I won't be swayed anymore.

subtitles.original: 騙し騙され胸うずく　下手な芝居がより盛り上げる夜
subtitles.english:
Deceiving and being deceived, my chest aches,
a clumsy performance only heats up the night.

subtitles.original: 息が耳に触れた二人 Ah
subtitles.english: Breaths touched ears, the two of us... Ah.

subtitles.original: ABC 続かない　そんなんじゃダメじゃない
subtitles.english: ABC won't follow, that's just not good enough, is it?

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は　違うんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Because deep down in your heart, it's different, isn't it?

subtitles.original: あたしの青春　そんなもんじゃない
subtitles.english: My youth isn't just about that.

subtitles.original: 熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to go all the way in a burning heat.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃやだよ　あたしイケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: It has to be you, I'm the forbidden sun.

subtitles.original: 交わす言葉の記憶遠く　口元の動きに揺れ動く
subtitles.english:
The memory of the words we exchanged is far away,
I'm swayed by the movement of your lips.

subtitles.original: 濡れた髪を撫でた　そして Ah
subtitles.english: I stroked your wet hair, and then... Ah.

subtitles.original: ABC ABC 続かない
subtitles.english: ABC ABC won't follow.

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は　違うんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Because deep down in your heart, it's different, isn't it?

subtitles.original: オレの青春　そんなもんじゃない　熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: My youth isn't just about that, I want to go all the way in a burning heat.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃやだよ　オレはイケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: It has to be you, I'm the forbidden sun.

subtitles.original: 絡み合う糸は　君と俺を結ぶ赤い糸
subtitles.english: The intertwined threads are the red thread that binds you and me.

subtitles.original: あつい！
subtitles.english: That was hot!

subtitles.original: 凄かったー！
subtitles.english: That was amazing!

subtitles.original: いや、この曲、番長のセクシーが溢れてていいですね。
subtitles.english: Man, this song really brought out Bancho's sexy side, it's great.

subtitles.original: ええ、ちょっとね、アチチになりましたね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it got a little 'achichi' in here.

subtitles.original: アチチだね。
subtitles.english: So 'achichi'.

subtitles.original: アチチだよ。
subtitles.english: It's scorching.

subtitles.original: 激アツ。あと社長の動きも激アツで。
subtitles.english: Super intense. And the Prez's moves were intense too.

subtitles.original: いや、社長の。お上手。歌なんだから。
subtitles.english: Oh, Prez. You're so skilled. Since it's singing, after all.

subtitles.original: 踊りか〜いってね。
subtitles.english: Thinking 'Is this a dance show?!'

subtitles.original: いや、凄かった。
subtitles.english: But man, it was incredible.

subtitles.original: いや、楽しかったです。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that was fun.

subtitles.original: 急に、あの、平成ですね、さっきから。
subtitles.english: Suddenly, it feels like we're back in the Heisei era.

subtitles.original: そうだね。夏メロというかなんというか。
subtitles.english: True. It's like a 'Natsumelo' classic.

subtitles.original: 出たばっかりだからね、令和になった。
subtitles.english: Since we only just moved into Reiwa, you know.

subtitles.original: お腹の底から痛くなってきたな。
subtitles.english: I'm starting to get butterflies in my stomach.

subtitles.original: さあ、そういう感じの選曲も続きますよということで。
subtitles.english: Well then, we've got more songs like that coming up.
